name: Graveyard Hunters
description:
Not yet playable: Q/E to zoom, AWSD to move player.

Welcome hunters!  Vampires have been reported in the area, and when asked, Count Dracula denies the rumors as being false.

- Turn based strategy game

- Fight rats, bats, thralls and Dracula himself.

- Use holy water, throwing daggers and stakes to defeat your undead enemies.
